How to use this..

To use it, either install virtualbox or make it portable using the appliation.

Then once you are on VirtualBox, click new, then just follow what you want, but when it asks which hard drive to use, click use existing drive, and choose the .vhd file.  Then just click until the wizard is finished, then run it.
Thanks cclloyd! You are most appreciated here.
